code: import React from"react";import{CurrentUserContext}from"../contexts/CurrentUserContext";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";function Card(props){var currentUser=React.useContext(CurrentUserContext);var isOwn=props.card.owner._id===currentUser._id;var isLiked=props.card.likes.some(function(i){return i._id===currentUser._id;});var cardDeleteButtonClassName="card__delete ".concat(!isOwn&&'card__delete_hidden');var cardLikeButtonClassName="card__like-icon ".concat(isLiked&&'card__like-icon_active');function handleClick(){props.onImageClick(props.card);}function handleLikeClick(){props.onCardLike(props.card);}function handleDeleteClick(){props.onCardDelete(props.card);}return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("li",{className:"card",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:props.card.link,alt:props.card.name,className:"card__image",onClick:handleClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__panel",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"card__title",children:props.card.name}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardDeleteButtonClassName,type:"button",onClick:handleDeleteClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"card__like",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{className:cardLikeButtonClassName,type:"button",onClick:handleLikeClick}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"card__like-count",children:props.card.likes.length})]})]})]});}export default Card;
